meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Geranium, typically having pink or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: I planted beautiful geraniums in my garden.
meanings.sent2: The geraniums in the park are blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns in the geraniums.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of geraniums in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of geraniums filled the air, bringing back memories of summer.

meanings.definition: The flowers of a geranium plant.
meanings.sent1: She picked a bouquet of vibrant geraniums for the table.
meanings.sent2: The bees buzzed happily around the fragrant geraniums.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully batted at the geraniums in the vase.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the same shade of pink as the geraniums in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the geraniums danced in the breeze.
